amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase the Consolidated Rail Infrastructure and Safety Improvements program (CRISI) account by $10 million to support rail safety with an equal offset to the Office of the Secretary of Transportation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawler amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
